name: More Demons
description: Adds additional demon difficulties above Extreme

omega-demon-disable.name: Disable Omega Demon
omega-demon-disable.description: Disables the Omega Demon difficulty for the current Top 1 Demon (replaced with Infernal Demon instead).

infinite-demon-disable.name: Disable BG Effects
infinite-demon-disable.description: Removes the background effects from Twisted+ Demon pages.

particles-disable.name: Disable Particles
particles-disable.description: Removes particles from Twisted+ Demon pages.
